description:
Embark on an epic adventure with the cutest chicken protagonist in this relaxing 2D puzzle platformer!
See if you can find the answer to the question that dumbfounded sages for millennia: "What came first: the Chicken or the Egg?"

Key Features:
- You are a chicken
- Explore curious environments and meet friendly creatures
- Peck your way through varied puzzles
- Relaxing game with no combat
- Wonderful soundtrack that you can chill to all day
name: Chicken Journey
intro: Play as an adorable chicken in this relaxing platformer. Jump, climb and solve puzzles to find the answer to the ULTIMATE question a chicken can ask...
